incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to RighTel Network in Iran

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to RighTel network in Iran. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to RighTel network in Iran. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may be failing to successfully connect. We are actively working to identify and resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 June 2024 at 00:00 PDT until 12 June 2024 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

scheduled_maintenances.name: Iraq SMS Carrier Maintenance - Multiple Carrier

incident_updates.body:
Multiple networks in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 02 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Multiple Carrier Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 21 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
22 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 22 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
